member.name: M:WebApplication1.Controllers.HirehubController.SignUp(WebApplication1.Models.UserModel)
member.summary: User can register themselves as student/placement cell and make a account on hirehub by entering valid emailid and strong password

member.name: M:WebApplication1.Controllers.HirehubController.LogValidation(WebApplication1.Models.UserModel)
member.summary: Students and placement cell members can login using the emailid and password they used during registering.

member.name: M:WebApplication1.Controllers.HirehubController.StudentInfo(WebApplication1.Models.StudentModel)
member.summary: Students can enter necessary information and build their profile.

member.name: M:WebApplication1.Controllers.HirehubController.EmployeeInfo(WebApplication1.Models.EmployeeModel)
member.summary: Placement cell members can enter necessary information and build their profile.

member.name: M:WebApplication1.Controllers.HirehubController.PostOpportuniy(WebApplication1.Models.OppotunityModel,Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.IFormFile)
member.summary: Placement cell can post opportunities by filling out required company information.

member.name: M:WebApplication1.Controllers.HirehubController.Application(WebApplication1.Models.Application)
member.summary: Students can register themselves for their interested opportunity and be an applicant for that company.

member.name: M:WebApplication1.Controllers.HirehubController.PostProcess(WebApplication1.Models.ProcessModel)
member.summary: Placement cell can post process details for an opportunity.

member.name: M:WebApplication1.Controllers.HirehubController.upcomingopps(System.String,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: The opportunities which is announced but yet to start their hiring process is displayed in this particular section

member.name: M:WebApplication1.Controllers.HirehubController.ongoingopps(System.String,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: The opportunities whose rounds are started are shown in ongoing opportunities section.

member.name: M:WebApplication1.Controllers.HirehubController.allopportunity
member.summary: This page contains all the opportunities whether new or old.

member.name: M:WebApplication1.Controllers.HirehubController.opportunitydetail(System.Int32)
member.summary: When an opportunity is opened, the users can view a detailed view of that particular opportunity.

member.name: M:WebApplication1.Controllers.HirehubController.skills(System.Int32)
member.summary: A list of required skills that a company wants can be viewed in the selected opportunity's detailed view.

member.name: M:WebApplication1.Controllers.HirehubController.roles(System.Int32)
member.summary: A list of open roles that a company wants to hire can be viewed in the selected opportunity's detailed view.

member.name: M:WebApplication1.Controllers.HirehubController.rounds(System.Int32)
member.summary: A list of each round that a company process consists of can be viewed in the selected opportunity's detailed view.

member.name: M:WebApplication1.Controllers.HirehubController.ProcessDetails(System.Int32)
member.summary: On opening the round details from opportunity details, one can view the full information of the process that is going to take place.

member.name: M:WebApplication1.Controllers.HirehubController.ShortlistedStudents(System.Int32)
member.summary: On opening the round details one can also viw the list of shortlisted students for that particular round.

member.name: M:WebApplication1.Controllers.HirehubController.AppliedStudents(System.Int32)
member.summary: On opening the opportunity details placement cell can also viw the list of applied students for that particular opportunity.

member.name: M:WebApplication1.Controllers.HirehubController.StudentProfile(System.Int32)
member.summary: Students can view their profile on this page.
